newsitem.title: UK: Tunisia, Iran sugar tender results still awaited.
newsitem.headline: Tunisia, Iran sugar tender results still awaited.

text.p: European sugar traders said on Thursday they were still expecting results of sugar buying tenders issued by Tunisia and Iran earlier this week.
Tunisia announced a snap tender on Wednesday to buy a cargo of raw sugar for September 15/30 shipment.
But the results could take some time to emerge as markets and public services are closed in Tunisia on Thursday for the Moslem New Year.

Iran tendered to buy a cargo of white sugar, said to be for July/August shipment, but traders said the sale was unlikely to be concluded as Iran was well supplied and its buying programme appeared to be complete.
"They're well covered...probably they're just looking for a cheap cargo," said one London trader.
Iran has been a regular buyer of both white and raw sugar in recent weeks. --Jeremy Smith, London Newsroom +44 171 542 8064
